description_expanded: Always Pocket Feminine Pads Size 2 Heavy Flow (20ct) is designed to deliver everyday reliability with thoughtful details suited for personal care. Ultra-thin pocket pads with FlexFoam for incredible absorption and comfort. Designed for heavy flow days, featuring wings for security and unscented for sensitivity. Built for convenience and value, it balances quality materials with practical features you can rely on at home, on the go, or as a thoughtful gift.
